metadata.title: CVE-2016-8681 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The _dwarf_get_abbrev_for_code function in dwarf_util.c in libdwarf20161001 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read) by calling the dwarfdump command on a crafted file.

criterions.comment: dwarfutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
